attributes.action: Increase the speed on Motorways and Dual Carriageways to 80MPH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why in the 21st Century do we still have a speed limit of 70 mph. Most modern cars can reach 70 mph without a problem. I believe that with modern braking systems and sensible driving, the time is right to increase the national speed limit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
